property.name: Rarity
property.value: Secret Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you summon this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then, your opponent chooses one of your shields. You may add that shield to your hand. Each of your cards put into your hand from your shields gets 'shield trigger'. Triple breaker Eternal Omega

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge until you lose or stop yourself. For each time you win, this creature gets +6000 power this turn and breaks an additional shield, and your opponent chooses one of his creatures that has 'blocker' and destroys it. Double breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Humans. When this creature would be destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Human, this creature stays in the battle zone instead. When this creature is destroyed, you may put all creatures that were under this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may choose any number of creatures from your mana zone or graveyard that have total cost 7 and put them into the battle zone. Quattro breaker Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 5 cards, then your opponent discards 5 cards from his hand. Triple breaker Eternal Omega(When this creature would leave the battle zone, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Guardians. Whenever one of your other Guardian creatures would be destroyed, you may put that creature under this creature instead. property.name: Rarity

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.(Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.) Double breaker

property.name: Rarity

property.value: When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead.
